line_1: His children dear approach his couch;
line_2: My heart still rests where I've lov'd much,

line_1: And scatter'd roses o'er the destin'd couch.
line_2: And saw a white-rob'd social train approach,

line_1: To rest a little on the Couch: —
line_2: She held it wholesomer by much,

line_1: The goblet fair and downy couch,
line_2: Thus with his threaten'd fate approach;

line_1: And scatters roses o'er th' expecting couch:
line_2: Whose life unstain'd full many virtues vouch,
